programme.desc: Magma Comes to the Surface - The dragon riders must sneak a very sick Magma Breather into the ICARIS infirmary.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep20
programme.desc: The Sky Torcher - The Sky Torcher & Flame Throwers invade the Crystal Realm. Tom must conquer his demons and bond with the Fault Ripper to defeat the Sky Torcher.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Troublesome Treachery of the Thieving Toot Fairy - George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Tenuous Takedown of the Tyrannical Teachertrons - In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Frantic Fury of the Fearsome Furculees - Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Dinotrux S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Shockarachnids - Dozer and Skya work together to find their way home after they are attacked by Shockarachnids, jumper-cable-like snakes with high-voltage bites

programme.title: Dinotrux S2 Ep38
programme.desc: Scaretrux - Revvit and the Reptools are trapped by Scraptors and create a fake T-Truxto scare them away, only to then have Skrap-It attempt to steal it

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S2 Ep37
programme.desc: The Day Mel Fell,Burns Ex Boo - Mel Shellman gets fired and crashes with the FAST crew, but he's so annoying they try to get him rehired, An old flame shows up, making Chet jealous.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S2 Ep38
programme.desc: Tough As Snails,Conspiracy - Whiplash takes on the toughest creature around in a MMA-style fight, When the FAST crew is abducted, Skidmark and his conspiracy club get on the case.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Trolling Through Iceland - When Odlulu uses a Wake-A-Troll Key to get her kite down from a tree, she accidentally brings two mythical Icelandic creatures to life. Using their wits and some Icelandic troll knowledge, the Wanderers must find a way to turn these mischievous creatures back to rock.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S2 Ep40
programme.desc: Gibraltar ROCKS! - When Wally and Wenda head to WWS Great Magic Key Vault, located in Gibraltar, to find Whitebeard a key for his birthday, they find that Odlulu has already cleaned out the vault, the Wanderers must round up all these keys, and they'll have to do it in time for Whitebeard's surprise birthday party.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 Ep26
programme.desc: The Case Of The Bird That Can't Fly - Noddy finds a bird in Pat-Pat's Treehouse that doesn't seem to be able to fly. He decides to investigate: how can they help the bird to fly? Noddy finds out that the bird can fly - it just doesn't want to. But why ?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 Ep27
programme.desc: The Case Of The Clockwork Mouse Mystery - Everyone in Toyland is excited about the first ever Winter Light Festival - except its organiser, Clockwork Mouse who is moving at super fast speed. Noddy investigates why she's acting so strangely. He works out that she's been trying to move at triple speed to get everything sorted in time. Noddy helps her realise that she doesn't have to do all the festival preparations on her own. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Silver Hatch Shapes Up - Conrod is having an engine tune up at Silver Hatch. He boasts that his spoilers make him faster than all the other cars who then want to be just as fast as their V8 hero

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 Ep40
programme.desc: Pit Stop Perils - Mr Carburettor is fed up with Roary and Maxi constantly bickering about who is the fastest car at Silver Hatch. He decrees that the pair will have a race, and whoever wins, is the fastest - no more arguing!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Why Vulture Is Bald - You see there was time when Vulture was not bald. Oh no, Vulture's head was covered in a beautiful crown of golden plumage! Vain Vulture never shut up about her golden feathers and was obsessed about making them 'as golden as the sun!'. One day Vulture decides to fly up to the sun, but her precious feathers get burnt! Vulture decides to sooth her smoking feathers with golden honey which she steals from the bees. The bees are not pleased and Vulture sticks her head down Aardvark's burrow. However, Aardvark loves feathers all covered in honey and when Vulture surfaces she is as bald as well, as a Vulture! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Why Giraffe Has A Long Neck - You see there was a time when Giraffe didn't have a long neck. Her neck was all short and stumpy and she was a very delicate eater. All the food in Tinga Tinga seemed to make her tummy go funny. Then one day Lion suggests she try some honey. With the Bees permission, Giraffe tries to lick the honey but it is deep, deep inside the tree. Giraffe squeezes her head into the honey tree and then EEEeeek! Her head gets stuck! Summer, Autumn, Winter pass by with Giraffe's head stuck inside the tree, but she is quite happy because the honey is so delicious. The tree grows and Giraffe's neck gets longer and longer! After a whole year 'POP!' she manages to pull herself free and from that day on Giraffe has a very long neck and can eat the freshest leaves on the very tops of the trees! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Kitty Rangers - Kitty Ranger Team Leader Mama Box helps Kitty Ranger Gabby and Pandy get a lost Baby Me-Owl back home to its Mama in the Fairy Tale Garden. They embark on a hiking adventure! They learn about animal tracking, earn patches along the way, and ultimately, reunite Baby with Mama!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Meow-Mazing Games - When Gabby, Pandy, and Carlita prepare for the annual Meow-Mazing Games, they encounter stiff competition from the Doodads and must work together to bring home the coveted dollhouse trophy.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Wu You Gonna Call? - After the reveal of magical creatures' existence and Yi's magic ability in at the end of Season 1, the city's citizens are unsure how to feel about this new revelation. A popular vlogger, Bryan Wu, sets out to capture viral-worthy footage of creatures and magic, under the guise of helping Yi and her friends get out their creature awareness message. Yi and the crew must step in when Bryan puts himself and creatures alike in peril in his pursuit of clickbait.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 Ep12
programme.desc: The Ditch Sitch - The crew gets their first ping on their new creature-helping app! A dried up jellyfish-type creature has been discovered at a construction site, and the anti-creature contractor wants it GONE. The crew try taking Jelleen to the sewers to live with Sewer Koi, but the unhappy creature creates a blackout in the sewers with its magical electric charge. Realizing that Jelleen should be able to stay in her original home, the crew must stand up against the contractor and force her to see the error of her ways or else!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Lucky And The Christmas Spirit - When Miradero's Christmas presents are delayed and snow isn't falling, Lucky and her friends decide it's up to them to bring the Christmas spirit to Miradero.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Lucky And The Deadly Blizzard - When a sudden blizzard hits Miradero, Lucky and Maricela must work together to save the town.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S1 Ep11
programme.desc: The Poppy Horror Picture Show , Dinkles Dinkles Little Star - After hearing a scary story Poppy tries to help Biggie get over his fearsHoping to enhance Mr. Dinkles selfconfidence Biggie enters him into a Bergen pet show.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S1 Ep12
programme.desc: The Party Games , Trolly Tales - Everyone gets excited because its time for the Trolls Annual funbased Party GamesPoppy and Branch try to convince the Troll kids that the library is fun.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep21
programme.desc: DJ's Glow Ride - Gabby receives a special nighttime delivery, unboxing a glow-in-the-dark train engine. However, she realizes that she's missing the other three train cars to complete the whole train. The Gabby Cats help Gabby build the other three glow-in-the-dark train cars by creating shapes through interactive/musical games. In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, DJ Catnip sings a song.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Rainy Day Banana - With a little help from Gabby's imagination, a sparkly toy banana turns into a magical Rainy Day Banana that helps Gabby and the Gabby Cats have fun on a rainy day! They have silly banana snacks with Cakey, make crafts to tell a story with Baby Box, and have an a-meow-zing banana dance party with DJ Catnip. For our Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Cakey sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep23
programme.desc: CatRat The Bandit - The dollhouse is immersed in imaginative Wild West play with Sheriff Gabby, Sheriff Pandy, and CatRat the Bandit. Sheriff Gabby and Sheriff Pandy must safely deliver gold to the bank, but it gets confiscated by Bandit CatRat! They go on an adventure to get the gold back and restore order in the dollhouse.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep24
programme.desc: DJ Catnip Gets His Groove Back - Gabby brings DJ Catnip a microphone for him to use in the big music show, but he has some terrible news: he lost his groove! Determined to help him get his groove back, Gabby and Pandy take him on a musical search through the dollhouse. As they go, Gabby uses the microphone to record sounds from the Gabby Cats' everyday activities that culminate into a new song that gets DJ his groove back just in time for the show! In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Gabby sings a song!

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Skate or Dawn - When Guy invents a primitive skateboard, Eep and Dawn have a blast trying new tricks. But when the punch monkeys want to take over the girl's awesome new skate spot, Dawn and the punch monkeys enter a skate-off to win back the skate canyon once and for all.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Phil's Fun Farm - When Phil learns no one on the farm thinks he's fun, he sets out to prove them all wrong... by building a crazy amusement park.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Cat Cop! - When baby families are leaving town, Boss Baby and Tim battle to prove Bootsy is behind it all

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Hang in There, Baby - When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Dr. Catastrophe - During an attempt to get displaced Fire Gronckles back to their native Fire Realm, D'Angelo makes a mistake by accidentally feeding them Catastrophic Quaken eggs.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep18
programme.desc: It Flies in the Family - Eugene discovers the Lair and demands a dragon of his own.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Unholy Dragon Returns to the Mountains - Jindiao takes Po and the kids hostage in an attempt to locate the Wellspring

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Sacrifice at the Edge of Time - The kids are desperate to get back and help their fellow Panda Villagers, and Po decides he must figure out a way to defeat Jindiao before he controls the world

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Mouse - Artephius tries to warn the town when an evil mouse charms his way into San Lorenzo - but no one will listen to him.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Goblin - Cleevil, an orphan goblin, seeks refuge in San Lorenzo - but, unbeknownst to Puss, he is in cahoots with the Duchess.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 Ep11

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Pandy's Birthday - It's Pandy's birthday!! The dollhouse is throwing a surprise party for him! Gabby goes room to room preparing all his favorite things for the party, but when the big moment comes, Pandy drops his cake! Gabby consoles him and tells him it's even better - now, they have smash cake! They all hold up a piece and pose for a picture.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Straycation Part II - While the parents are away, the kids are in charge of the tree house, but when the punch monkeys invade the house, the kids find themselves out of their element.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Thunder Misters - Jealous of the Thunder Sisters, the men on the farm undergo a series of difficult initiation rituals to try and join the exclusive tribe of women.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Eep loves action and adventure - it's in her blood. But when Eep starts adventuring in her sleep, she has to try to find the cause of her new sleep walking to avoid ending up in dangerous situations.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep1
programme.desc: First Flight: Part 1 - Moving to an exotic new home, an adventurous teenager meets a new group of kids and discovers a dragon in the fissure.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep2
programme.desc: First Flight: Part 2 - Tom forges a friendship with the dragon and discovers an entire world of dragons within the fissure.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Hole New World - Tom and Jun encounter unexpected dangers and are separated while exploring the Hidden Realm of dragons. Tom introduces Jun to the dragon world, and Jun bonds with a dragon of her own - Wu and Wei.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep65
programme.desc: Biscuits Rising - Lured into an empty hotel where a baby has supposedly gone missing, the team is trapped by Crispin Biscuits, a chaotic British schoolboy baby who's been hired to wreck Boss and Tina's lives. Crispin puts the new company's loyalty to a test in a series of fiendish puzzling mind games, all with the threat of constant balloon popping (horrible for baby ears!)

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep66
programme.desc: Moon Shot - Our team's startup company and their rivals at Baby Corp get in a Space Race, competing to see who can make the cutest kiddie-pretend moon landing for a baby - a spectacle sure to bring in a bounty of Baby Love. With both companies pouring their resources into a simulated space take off, tempers and sabotage are running hot, and the scrappy little startup is in danger of getting crushed by their big business competitor.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep67
programme.desc: Inner Children - JJ reluctantly lets Tina take over her assistant duties for the day, but a Tina slip-up leads to an outbreak of town adults drinking diluted special formula that makes them all baby-brained. When JJ discovers this, she works with R & D Baby Simmons and Security Baby Katja to antidote the wobbling Adult Babies before Tina can find out and blame herself.

programme.desc: Liberty Makes a New Friend / Pups Save the Pup Pup Boogie Contest - Liberty mistakenly brings a bear into town, thinking it's someone's pet. She must fix her mistake and rescue Chickaletta. //Francois' hot-air balloon goes out of control before the Pup Pup Boogie Contest.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep114
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Splash Park / The Crew Builds A Playroom - With their splash park plans in troubled waters, the pups have to get creative to cool down the town for the summer. // As the pups work on building a surprise playroom for Lucas and Lily.

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Crabby Boots / Papi's Picnic Party - Dora and Boots meet Shelly, a hermit crab missing her shell, who uses one of Boots' boots. Dora travels across the beach in search of her old shell. // Papi is having a quesadilla picnic.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S03 Ep305

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Rock Pools - Granny and Grandpa Pig take Peppa and George to a beach with lots of rocks and little rock pools to explore. They all have fun with a little crab, a seashell and a fossil.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Teddy's Day Out - Peppa and her family are having a picnic. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zo Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic. When its home time, Peppa leaves her teddy behind.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Emily Elephant - There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep210
programme.desc: George's Friend - George and Rebecca Rabbit's little brother Richard each have a toy dinosaur. Mummy Pig shows them that they can have much more fun at the playground if they play together.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep211
programme.desc: The Boat Pond - Peppa and her family and friends are playing at the pond with their toy boats. Everyone has a boat to play with except Rebecca Rabbit. Daddy Pig makes Rebecca a boat out of newspaper.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Mr Scarecrow - The birds keep eating the seeds from Grandpa Pig's flower garden. Peppa and George make a scarecrow, which stops the birds from eating.

programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Dinosaur Museum / The Crew Builds a Wheelchair Ramp - After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a dinosaur museum! // When Omar the Mail Carrier breaks his foot, it's up to the pups to make sure he can still deliver the mail.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Pups Save the Polar Bears / A Pup in Sheep's Clothing - Ryder and the pups must fly to the Arctic in the Air Patroller to rescue the lost cubs. // When little lambs keep running away from Farmer Als pasture, its up to the Paw Patrol to find the missing sheep.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1018
programme.desc: Pups Save Little Grandpa and Mr. Alex - When Alex and Mr. Porter swap roles, the pups must help track down the Mini-Patrol after they go missing.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Barbabright Has a Secret / Super Duper Cool - Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Barbabright's Invention - Barbabright has a stroke of genius: the invention of the "BAM".

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Boots / Moon Parrot / Tailball - Tim tries out some new rocket boots which soon fly out of control. // Tim, Tommy and Tia bird-sit the Bronte's MoonParrot. // Tim, Tommy and Tia take on their parents at Tailball.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep117
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Observatory - The pups jump into action to build an observatory to help their friend River get a cool picture of a shooting star!

programme.title: DORA S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Ratoncito Perez / The Berry Hungry Caterpillar - Dora helps Ratoncito Perez fix his magic toothbrush wand so she can get a gift for her missing tooth. // Dora meets Carlos, a giant caterpillar who wants to be a butterfly!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep604
programme.desc: Sir Blaze and the Unicorn - Witness the return of Sir Blaze and Sir AJ as they embark on an epic quest to free a magical unicorn from an unpoppable bubble!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Barbabravo Is Not Feeling Well / Be Patient Barbabravo... - Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Present / Movie / Vinny - Tim, Tommy and Tia can't decide on the best gift for Grandma. // Tim tries to make his own Captain DinoStar movie. // Tim fakes it to prove he's just as cool as Kai's cousin.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Pups' Adventures in Babysitting / Pups Save the Fireworks - Mayor Goodway calls on the Paw Patrol to rescue her twin niece and nephew from a tree. // Expecting the fireworks for Adventure Bay Day, Mayor Goodway receives a package of piglets.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep614
programme.desc: Pups Save a Mud Monster - Snowboarders on Jake's Mountain are stuck on a broken chair lift while a monster is on the loose!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep220
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Post Office / The Crew Builds A Super Farm Animal Wash - Builder Cove needs a post office! But when construction gets squirrely, it's up to the pups to find a construction solution. //

programme.title: DORA S02 Ep211
programme.desc: The Great Abuela Cookoff / Missing Map - After the Pokey Pigeons eat all of Abuela's elotes, Dora and Boots set out to find more ingredients for the Great Abuela Cook-off. / Dora, Boots and Backpack play an adventurous game.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Pups Save the Mail / Pups Save a Frog Mayor - The postman's truck gets stuck in the mud and the mail gets stuck in a tree. // Mayor Goodway turns into a frog.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep421
programme.desc: Pups Save the Runaway Turtles / Pups Save the Shivering Sheep - Daring Danny X accidently drives off with turtle eggs. // Farmer Al's sheep runaway and Mayor Humdinger's kittens go missing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Work and Play - When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep302
programme.desc: The Rainbow - Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pedro's Cough - Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle.Doctor Brown Bear gives them terrible-tasting medicine.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Recycling - Peppa and George help Mummy Pig tidy up the breakfast things. Mummy Pig tells them that bottles go into a special green box to be recycled. Old newspapers go in a red box and tins go in a blue box.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Pirate Island - Grandpa and Granny Pig are taking Peppa, George and their friends to Pirate Island. Grandpa shows how to use his metal detector to find treasures and they all build a big sandcastle.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Birth / The Revelation - Young Franois witnesses the birth of Barbapapa. // Barbapapa is a prisoner in a zoo.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Prank Day - Barbabravo, Barbalala and Barbabeau are fed up with their brothers and sisters laughing at their expense.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Rocket Race / Magic / Parents - Tommy is in a Rocket Race, Tim supports his brother. // Tim distracts Tia when Tusky is in the washing machine. // The kids become the parents and the parents become the kids.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Sneezing Cold - Gabby, Blaze and AJ are out in the wilderness when they get a call, Blaze's friends have come down with a sickness called the Sneezles! Our heroes must race back to Axle City.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep907
programme.desc: Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art - Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, they must solve the Missing Art Mystery.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep908
programme.desc: Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand - When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep912
programme.desc: Pups Save a Lonely Ghost - Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A School / The Crew Builds A Waterway - It's the first day of school in Builder Cove... if Rubble & Crew can finish the building in time! / The pups need a construction solution to save Farmer Zoe's crops .

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep117
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Observatory / The Crew Builds A Zipline - The pups jump into action to build an observatory to help their friend River get a cool picture of a shooting star! // After meeting Park Ranger Rose, the pups get stuck on a nature trail.

programme.title: DORA S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Big Big Boots / Backpack's Sticky Situation - Boots is too short to go on a ride, so he wishes to be bigger and becomes giant! Dora helps him go back to his normal size. // Backpack has something special for Dora, but she can't open!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep5
programme.desc: The Mime Badge - Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep6
programme.desc: The Why Badge - Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep7
programme.desc: The Sibling Badge - Roly reveals he's expecting a new baby brother or sister, and the Squirrels have questions.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hey Quacky! - Worm and Ladybird wonder what's going on at Squirrel Club. There's a gorilla playing drums, some helpful ducks, a hot frog, four goats and a hospital run by chicken doctors.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Frog Song - It's fun on the counting train until Naughty Monkey starts to drive! Ethel makes a shape, Frog drops beats with a ribbit song, and Enid turns into anime to chase after a mouse.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep4
programme.desc: What's Hot? - Billy and the Sillies introduce a visit to chicken A&E, the Squirrels build a bug house, Norrie has her chance to shine, and the Penguins give facts about what's hot and what's not.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep26
programme.desc: Fairy Tale - Dad tells Bluey and Bingo a real-life fairy tale about growing up in a wild place called the '80s, about a boy who was cursed when he was mean to his little brother.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep27
programme.desc: Musical Statues - At the end of a long day, Bluey and her family are out of sync and out of sorts, so Mum gets everyone to play musical statues.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep28
programme.desc: Stories - Indy thinks she's no good because her model horse looks like a cow, but Calypso encourages her not to give up, so she tries to fix it with a little help from Winton.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep100
programme.desc: Lights Out - When the lights go out in Home Dome, the Teletubbies get the giggles! The lights come back on again and there's Tubby Custard mess everywhere.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Tubby Custard and Toast - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing about the wonders of Tubby Custard and Toast.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep37
programme.desc: The Zip Express - The friends board the Zip Express, a train that takes them across Pop Paper City. But when the friends face an unexpected challenge, it's unknown if the train will reach their destination on time.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep51
programme.desc: Dog Loves Diaries - Dog and Pug are trying to remember what they did yesterday. Their diary tells them that they found Granny Pug's lunchbox. They go off to find her but she on the other side of a ravine.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep48
programme.desc: Wiggly Worms - When Mayor Oki's pumpkins aren't big enough Messy and his friends muck in and save the day! With the help of some wiggly worms...

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep49
programme.desc: Second Chances - Messy helps his friends find Zoe's lost communicator, which has ended up in the recycling. Luckily for Zoe, Zim is magnetic!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep39
programme.desc: Dad Dancing - Stan doesn't want to dance because he's not good at it, leaving Monty wondering whether you have to be good at things to enjoy them.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep8
programme.desc: It's Time to Build a Nest - JoJo and Gran Gran spot a bird's nest in Cynthia's garden, which inspires JoJo to make a nest for Panda. Meanwhile, Daddy helps teach JoJo how to whistle just like a bird.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep7
programme.desc: It's Time to Dress Up - JoJo and Gran Gran have fun finding Gran Gran's old clothes. When Charlene brings round a sewing machine, it's time for a Gran Gran plan - they can make JoJo some new clothes too!

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep39
programme.desc: Snowball Skate - Sarah and Duck explore a Winter Fair in the park, and discover an amazing skating rink inside a giant snowball!

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Decorating Donkey - Sarah plans a surprise for when her hibernating tortoise wakes up.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep23
programme.desc: Thomas and the Royal Engine - An invitation from the Queen sends Thomas and the crew to London as they weave through delays and debacles while racing to a royal celebration.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Charades - Bluey and Bingo want everyone to play charades, but Muffin and Socks are too young to understand the rules and Nana must think quickly to keep the game on track.

programme.title: Supertato S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Sweetieland Saga - Evil Pea cheats Chilli out of winning floofy teddies at a funfair made from sweets, so Supertato and the Veggies must get the teddies back before it's too late!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep36
programme.desc: The Water Badge - The squirrels learn all about where water comes from, and their journey takes them from the sea and back to the kitchen sink and another drink of water. Wow! Water is amazing!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep37
programme.desc: The Traffic Badge - Duggee and the squirrels begin a trip to the lake, but get stuck in a traffic jam!

programme.desc: It's Time to Build a Nest - JoJo and Gran Gran spot a bird's nest in Cynthia's garden, which inspires JoJo to make a nest for Panda. Meanwhile, Daddy helps teach JoJo how to whistle just like a bird.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep7
programme.desc: It's Time to Dress Up - JoJo and Gran Gran have fun finding Gran Gran's old clothes. When Charlene brings round a sewing machine, it's time for a Gran Gran plan - they can make JoJo some new clothes too!

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep39
programme.desc: Snowball Skate - Sarah and Duck explore a Winter Fair in the park, and discover an amazing skating rink inside a giant snowball!

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Decorating Donkey - Sarah plans a surprise for when her hibernating tortoise wakes up.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep23
programme.desc: Thomas and the Royal Engine - An invitation from the Queen sends Thomas and the crew to London as they weave through delays and debacles while racing to a royal celebration.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Charades - Bluey and Bingo want everyone to play charades, but Muffin and Socks are too young to understand the rules and Nana must think quickly to keep the game on track.

programme.title: Supertato S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Sweetieland Saga - Evil Pea cheats Chilli out of winning floofy teddies at a funfair made from sweets, so Supertato and the Veggies must get the teddies back before it's too late!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep36
programme.desc: The Water Badge - The squirrels learn all about where water comes from, and their journey takes them from the sea and back to the kitchen sink and another drink of water. Wow! Water is amazing!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep37
programme.desc: The Traffic Badge - Duggee and the squirrels begin a trip to the lake, but get stuck in a traffic jam!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hey Quacky! - Worm and Ladybird wonder what's going on at Squirrel Club. There's a gorilla playing drums, some helpful ducks, a hot frog, four goats and a hospital run by chicken doctors.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won't find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today's world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.desc: Santiago de Compostela - The Way of St. James is actually a network of paths made up of several hiking trails across Europe. programme.title: Little Charo

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Hyper-modern Japanese kitchens are compact, comfortable spaces for cooking and eating. We look at the history and evolution of this space at the heart of every Japanese home.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: Todaiji Temple is a World Heritage Site. We encounter cats-and also deer-who live at the temple. One cat keeps an eye on his owner's pickle shop. Another cat enjoys listening to flute music.

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: Elegant and practical, braided cords are essential for kimono and other aspects of everyday life.

programme.title: Easy Japanese for Work
programme.desc: Today: explaining a need for staffing adjustment. Kaung Htet Paing, from Myanmar, works at Narita Airport. In a roleplay challenge, he reports to a supervisor that a coworker is unwell.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Yumi Hayakawa creates one-of-a-kind textiles. Living at near total self-sufficiency, whether food as compost or cloth as material, no scraps are wasted. Valuing the cycle of life.

programme.title: NHK WORLD SELECTION

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1801
programme.desc: British Invasion - Its a British invasion of the world-famous Octagon as the top stars from across the pond show off their incredible skills on UFC Unleashed. Featuring Tom Aspinall, Meatball Molly McCann, and Paddy The Baddy Pimblett.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC284MakhachevvsVolkanovski
programme.desc: At UFC 284, featherweight king Alexander Volkanovski sought a new challenge and a second belt by challenging lightweight champion Islam Makhachev. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their title bout on UFC Main Event.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS
programme.desc: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS - 10 hopeful efforts, 10 absolute beauties. Lautaro Martinez, Paolo Dybala, Hakan Calhanoglu and more from wayyy out.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC312DuPlessisvsStrickland
programme.desc: UFC returns down under to Sydney, Austalia, where Middleweight champion Dricus Du Plessis defends his crown against Sean Strickland, the man he took it from, and undefeated TUF 23 winner Tatiana Suarez aims to unseat 2-time champion Zhang Weili for the Women's Strawweight title. Plus more on UFC Reloaded!

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep9
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep20
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback Ep1101
programme.desc: Gaethje vs Holloway - UFC 300 was not only a milestone event for the worlds leading MMA organization but featured a highly anticipated bout between Justin Gaethje and Max Holloway as they battled for the BMF belt and the title of the baddest fighter on the planet. See their fight like never seen before with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC312DuPlessisvsStrickland
programme.desc: UFC returns down under to Sydney, Austalia, where Middleweight champion Dricus Du Plessis defends his crown against Sean Strickland, the man he took it from, and undefeated TUF 23 winner Tatiana Suarez aims to unseat 2-time champion Zhang Weili for the Women's Strawweight title. Plus more on UFC Reloaded!

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts
programme.desc: Dana White's Contender Series Alum - UFC Ultimate Knockouts delivers jaw-dropping finishes from fighters who earned their spots through Dana Whites Contender Series. See rising stars and future champions like Jack Della Maddalena, Carlos Prates, Sean OMalley, and more.

programme.title: UFC Countdown EpUFC317TopuriavsOliveira
programme.desc: UFC 317 Countdown previews two title fights, as former 145-pound king Ilia Topuria faces former 155-pound champion Charles Oliveira for the vacant lightweight title. In the co-main event, flyweight champ Alexandre Pantoja faces Kai Kara-France.

programme.title: LALIGA LEGENDS PEP GUARDIOLA
programme.desc: LALIGA LEGENDS PEP GUARDIOLA - More than a title-winning machine, Pep Guardiola changed the face of football. Trace the evolution of his famed tiki-taka style of play that propelled the likes of Messi, Xavi, Iniesta and Busquets to footballing royalty.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC 321: Aspinall vs. Gane
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFC heavyweight world championship will be on the line on October 25 at Etihad Arena in Abu Dhabi when Tom Aspinall defends his undisputed crown for the first time against Ciryl Gane in the main event of UFC 321. Englands Aspinall has ended his last three wins by knockout, including an interim title-winning effort over Sergei Pavlovich and a successful defense against Curtis Blaydes. This fall, he will face another stern test in French star Gane, a former interim champ looking to add undisputed goal to his trophy case after back-to-back wins over Serghei Spivac and Alexander Volkov

programme.title: LIVE: UFC 321: Aspinall vs. Gane
programme.desc: Main Event - The UFC heavyweight world championship will be on the line on October 25 at Etihad Arena in Abu Dhabi when Tom Aspinall defends his undisputed crown for the first time against Ciryl Gane in the main event of UFC 321. Englands Aspinall has ended his last three wins by knockout, including an interim title-winning effort over Sergei Pavlovich and a successful defense against Curtis Blaydes. programme.desc: Prelims - UFC Fight Night: de Ridder vs. Allen is an upcoming mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that will take place on October 19, 2025, at Rogers Arena in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada
